nodes.text: Replica droids were droids layered with cloned skin to imitate humans. The feminine protocol droid named White had an exquisite outline similar to that of a replica droid's. Owned by Li Yu in a largely independent star system in the Oplovis sector around 82 BBY, White was observed by the human Jedi Sean to possess a simple coat of white paint that made her seem, unlike replica droids, disdainful of imitating humans.
